sentences.en: A downpour of rain put out the children's bonfire.
sentences.cn: 一阵大雨把孩子们的营火都浇灭了.

sentences.en: A woman throws an object into a bonfire on a beach in Malaga, southern Spain.
sentences.cn: 在西班牙南部的马拉噶镇，一个女人把一个东西投入篝火中。

sentences.en: As a bonfire dispels chilliness, so our solidarity drives away the enemy.
sentences.cn: 篝火能把寒冷驱散, 团结能把敌人赶跑.

sentences.en: I can't miss my to rake leaves, have a bonfire, roast chestnuts.
sentences.cn: 我不能错过耙叶子 、 点篝火 、 烤栗子的机会.

sentences.en: I know you love a good bonfire, Dylan.
sentences.cn: 我知道你很喜欢篝火晚会, 戴兰.

sentences.en: It's a dress he wears on high days , holidays and bonfire nights.
Off to one side, the militia was heaping up wood for a bonfire.
sentences.cn: 在一侧，民兵们正在堆起木柴，准备生起篝火。

sentences.en: One of them told me this: "When you write, you light a bonfire in the spirit world.
sentences.cn: 其中一个人这样对我说：当你写的时候，你点燃了一簇精神世界的篝火。

sentences.en: People are circling around the bonfire and dancing happily.
sentences.cn: 人们正围绕着篝火快乐地跳着舞.

sentences.en: Some sods have been removed to make a place for the bonfire.
sentences.cn: 几块草皮已经移掉以便空出地方燃营火.

sentences.en: The bonfire blazed away for hours.
sentences.cn: 营火继续燃烧了几个钟头

sentences.en: The camp bonfire flamed away all the evening.
sentences.cn: 整个晚上野营的篝火都在燃烧.

sentences.en: They piled wood onto the bonfire until the flames roared.
sentences.cn: 他们不断往篝火上加木柴,直到火光冲天.

sentences.en: We built a huge bonfire, and collected all the people around it.
sentences.cn: 我们堆了一大堆木头,烧着烟火, 把老乡们都叫了来围着[它](烟火).

sentences.en: We made a bonfire of dead leaves in the garden.
sentences.cn: 我们在花园里点燃火堆把枯叶烧掉.

sentences.en: We'll make a bonfire to - night in the Champs - Gaillard with Matre Andry's books!
sentences.cn: 今晚就用安德里老公的书,在加伊亚广场放焰火吧!

sentences.en: Wood was piled onto the bonfire until the flames roared.
sentences.cn: 木柴被不断地添放在篝火上,直到火旺起来.

trans.tran_en: a large outdoor fire, either for burning waste or for a party
